verses.text: \w Be|strong="G1161"\w* \w sure|strong="G1097"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w last|strong="G2078"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w difficult|strong="G5467"\w* \w times|strong="G2540"\w* \w will|strong="G3778"\w* \w come|strong="G1764"\w*.

\w People|strong="G1510"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* selfish, mercenary, boastful, haughty, \w and|strong="G3588"\w* blasphemous; disobedient \w to|strong="G1510"\w* \w their|strong="G3588"\w* \w parents|strong="G1118"\w*, ungrateful, impure,
incapable \w of|strong="G1228"\w* affection, merciless, \w slanderous|strong="G1228"\w*, wanting in self-control, brutal, careless \w of|strong="G1228"\w* the right,

\w treacherous|strong="G4273"\w*, \w reckless|strong="G4312"\w*, \w and|strong="G2228"\w* puffed up \w with|strong="G2228"\w* \w pride|strong="G5187"\w*; they \w will|strong="G3123"\w* love \w pleasure|strong="G5369"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w than|strong="G2228"\w* they love \w God|strong="G5377"\w*;

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w while|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w retain|strong="G2192"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* outward \w form|strong="G3446"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* religion, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G2532"\w* allow \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* influence \w them|strong="G3588"\w*. Turn \w your|strong="G2192"\w* back \w on|strong="G1161"\w* \w such|strong="G3778"\w* \w people|strong="G3588"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w among|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w found|strong="G1510"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w creep|strong="G1744"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* homes \w and|strong="G2532"\w* captivate \w weak|strong="G1133"\w* \w women|strong="G1133"\w* – \w women|strong="G1133"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w*, loaded \w with|strong="G1537"\w* sins, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* slaves \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G2532"\w* kinds \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w passions|strong="G1939"\w*,

\w are|strong="G2532"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w* \w learning|strong="G3129"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w never|strong="G3368"\w* \w able|strong="G1410"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* attain \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w real|strong="G1922"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* truth.

\w Just|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jannes|strong="G2389"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jambres|strong="G2387"\w* opposed \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w do|strong="G2532"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w people|strong="G3588"\w*, \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* turn, oppose \w the|strong="G2532"\w* truth. \w Their|strong="G2532"\w* \w minds|strong="G3563"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* corrupted, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w as|strong="G1161"\w* regards \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* utterly worthless.

\w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w however|strong="G5613"\w*, \w make|strong="G2532"\w* \w further|strong="G4119"\w* \w progress|strong="G4298"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w wicked|strong="G3588"\w* folly \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* plain \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w*, \w just|strong="G5613"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* folly Jannes \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Jambres \w was|strong="G1510"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, Timothy, \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w a|strong="G1161"\w* close observer \w of|strong="G4102"\w* \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1319"\w*, \w my|strong="G1473"\w* conduct, \w my|strong="G1473"\w* purposes, \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w my|strong="G1473"\w* forbearance, \w my|strong="G1473"\w* love, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w patient|strong="G5281"\w* \w endurance|strong="G5281"\w*,

\w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w well|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w my|strong="G1722"\w* \w persecutions|strong="G1375"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w sufferings|strong="G3804"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* met \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* Antioch, \w Iconium|strong="G2430"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lystra|strong="G3082"\w*. \w You|strong="G1722"\w* \w know|strong="G1722"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w persecutions|strong="G1375"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* underwent; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w brought|strong="G1096"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w safe|strong="G1722"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*!

\w Yes|strong="G1161"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* aim \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* religious \w life|strong="G2198"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* union \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w have|strong="G2309"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w suffer|strong="G2532"\w* \w persecution|strong="G1377"\w*;

\w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w wicked|strong="G4190"\w* \w people|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w impostors|strong="G1114"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w bad|strong="G4190"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w worse|strong="G5501"\w*, \w deceiving|strong="G4105"\w* \w others|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w deceived|strong="G4105"\w* themselves.

\w You|strong="G4771"\w*, \w however|strong="G1161"\w*, must \w stand|strong="G3306"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* learnt \w and|strong="G2532"\w* accepted \w as|strong="G1722"\w* true. \w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G3844"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* learnt \w it|strong="G2532"\w*;

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G1223"\w* \w childhood|strong="G1025"\w*, \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w known|strong="G1492"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w sacred|strong="G2413"\w* \w writings|strong="G1121"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w give|strong="G4679"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4679"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w belief|strong="G4102"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w leads|strong="G1519"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*.

\w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* God-breathed: helpful \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1319"\w*, \w for|strong="G4314"\w* refuting error, \w for|strong="G4314"\w* giving guidance, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w training|strong="G3809"\w* \w others|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*;

\w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w people|strong="G3956"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* capable \w and|strong="G2316"\w* \w equipped|strong="G1822"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w good|strong="G3956"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w kind|strong="G3956"\w*.
